text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Jesenje is a municipality in the Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. In the 2011 census, there were a total of 1,560 inhabitants. The absolute majority of the population are Croats at 99.36%. The population is distributed in the following settlements: * Brdo Jesenjsko, population 169 * Cerje Jesenjsko, population 158 * Donje Jesenje, population 359 * Gornje Jesenje, population 749 * Lužani Zagorski, population 125 ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Jesenje
